segments.text: Well , everything is packed and ready to go .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's hard to believe that we're really leaving . The past two weeks was like a dream .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Just think the blue sky , sunshine , mouth-watering food , centuries-old castles - -
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And the people were so friendly !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , we would have been lost without the help of the locals .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you still remember the small restaurant at the corner of the street ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course . That was the best pasta I've ever had .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ate so much that I wasn't hungry until afternoon the next day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If only we could eat there once more !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe we can come here again next summer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hope the restaurant is still there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , my god ! Only two hours left before the plane takes off . We need to be at the airport now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't worry . We can call a cab . It'll be alright .
segments.speaker: S2
